FuncDef:
The interface command binds an access interface for static users to an interface list.
The undo interface command unbinds an access interface for static users from an interface list.
By default, no access interface for static users is bound to an interface list.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 characters.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow multiple IPv4 static users on the same network segment to go online through multiple specified interfaces, run the static-user interface-list command to configure an access interface list. Then, run the interface command to bind a specified interface to the configured interface list.
Prerequisites
The interface to be bound to an interface list has been configured as a BAS interface.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
